column5: The Bass pro description says the Duracast is made for spinning reels. Has anyone tried it? Any good or bad reviews?  Here is a like to it:  http://www.basspro.com/webapp/wcs/stores/s...017000_100-17-3

I have used Tuff-Line (Western Filament) products in the past.  The company makes everything from thread to the ropes used by tug boats... This line looks like an 8 strand braid, around a mono core, with an outer coating... The price is right, why don't you buy a spool and let us all know how it works?
